remarks: Extended sum is monotonic.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2017.)
statement:
esummono.f $e |- F/ k ph $.
esummono.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
esummono.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. C ) -> B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esummono.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ C ) $.
esummono $p |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A B <_ sum* k e. C B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k $.
